*“Turn yourself not away from three best things: Good Thought, Good Word, and Good Deed.” \~ [Zarathushtra](https://www.britannica.com/biography/Zarathustra)*

The website content is divided into four main types:

* [Projects](/#category=project): Longer term and more complex work involving code, and other software websites.
* [Articles](/#category=article): Shorter term work involving coding and analysis and opinion. Reviews would come under articles.
* [Guides](/#category=guide): Longer term and frequently updated notes for learning topics.
* [Misc](/#category=misc): Random stuff that does not fit anything formal.

The content categories are further divided into four main areas:

* [Product Management](/#category=product): Planning, creating, designing, managing, & selling products. UI/UX design, technology, business & startups.
* [Data Science](/#category=datascience): Data science, analytics, visualization, machine learning & artificial intelligence.
* [Metaverse](/#category=metaverse): Includes Augmented, Virtual, Mixed, Extended Reality hardware, software, code & business 
* [Software](/#category=software): Usage, coding, setup, scripts, algorithsm, & recommendations.
